title: On Wings of Eagles
description: The Team: The Eagles, a group of volunteers from the executive ranks of a great American corporation, handpicked and trained by a retired Green Beret officer.The Mission: To penetrate a heavily guarded prison fortress in Iran and free the Americans imprisoned there.The Odds: If you had to calculate them, you didn't go.The story on these pages would have been incredibly exciting had it been fiction. But it is more than that - it is fact. It's a story that only Ken Follett, today's master of action and suspense, could do justice to.
author: Ken Follett
